document_data.mainbody:
halavon Narthiir was a male companion who worked at the Dryads Dreams of Mosstone in Tethyr.
Chalavon was slender and graceful, a strong contrast for Ardogh Stonegrip, a fellow courtesan and a mountainous man.
Chalavon was one of the male escorts who worked at Dryads Dreams in the late 14 century DR, along with several men and women who offered their services and companionship at the only festhall in Mosstone. Chalavons skills laid in his wit and sharp mind who could out-speak a sage. He was a talented chess player who rarely lost at the game.
